post.author: 최익준
post.content:
혹시 ACPI(Advanced Configuration and Power Interface) button이 있나요? 없으면 "Add/Remove Hardware Wizard"에서 ACPI Fixed Feature Button 설치 후 해보셔요... (누구 더 정확히 아시는 분 reply해 주세요)
이성기 wrote: > > I did 'Power button' under screen saver but there is no 'APM' and I can not find 'Automatic Power Management' in any tab. The tabs under power option properties box are > power schemes > advanced > hibernate > ups > > Which one should I go? > >
post.title: RE: can't find the APM
